attributes.additional_details: The people of Ukraine are going through a war, if the government isn’t even decent enough to let them through the border, no one at all will ever like you, you have made enough bad decisions, so if you make a truly good one, it will be much better for your reputation and all that-
attributes.background: The government isn’t doing enough to help Ukraine in their struggle, we get amazing things, such as a nice house to live in, or a meal 3 times a day. Ukraine DONT- they are living in their basements to hide from the war. The government aren’t even letting the past the border. They need more help

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign the following petitions which we currently have open on this topic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?q=Ukraine&state=open
